channel.title: Hest
channel.itunes:author: Ivan Reese
channel.description: Ivan Reese thinks out loud about the design of his esoteric graphical programming system.

item.title: 1 • Graphical Programming
item.description: The term "visual programming" is a bit of a misnomer. My preference is "graphical programming", though it's hard to overcome cultural inertia. Oh, also, welcome to the show. Let's talk about Hest.

item.title: 2 • Why?
item.description: Why am I making Hest? Who is it for? When did I start? When will it end? What is it now? Where is it going? And what of this podcast?

item.title: 3 • Waterslides
item.description: Functions and data, conveyance, points and edges, the kid, and the red paint brush.

item.title: 4 • Time Travel
item.description: Grab the giant thumb, push it all the way to infinity at the top, or negative infinity at the bottom.
